CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Edwardsborough Bulls?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Edwardsborough Bulls is arc {East Rovers}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Edwardsborough Bulls?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Edwardsborough Bulls is arc {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Rovers} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from East Rovers to South Stars in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Eddiehaven Panthers to East Rovers in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Edwardsborough Bulls and South Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Edwardsborough Bulls and South Stars is {276}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and Edwardsborough Bulls in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Eddiehaven Panthers and Edwardsborough Bulls is {87}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from East Rovers?
SC.A: The total flow output from East Rovers is {1393}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Edwardsborough Bulls?
SC.A: The total flow input by Edwardsborough Bulls is {776}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 551? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {575} from {East Rovers} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 121? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {87} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 281 and 409? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {286} from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {East Rovers}, a flow of {405} from {East Rovers} to {Eddiehaven Panthers}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Edwardsborough Bulls to Eddiehaven Panthers or from Edwardsborough Bulls to East Rovers?
NC.A: The flow from {Edwardsborough Bulls} to {East Rovers} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Eddiehaven Panthers to Edwardsborough Bulls, from South Stars to Edwardsborough Bulls, or from Eddiehaven Panthers to East Rovers?
NC.A: The flow from {Eddiehaven Panthers} to {East Rovers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Edwardsborough Bulls}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {East Rovers} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Edwardsborough Bulls, Arc East Rovers, Arc South Stars, Arc Eddiehaven Panthers}.
